oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fall of General Gibbs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Print entitled Fall of General Gibbs. Battle scene with a man arching back on a horse, under a flag, surrounded by other soldiers on horseback. Dead soldiers in the foreground.
Gibbs was second-in-command to General Pakenham at the Battle of New Orleans. Gibbs died while leading a charge on the American lines.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gibbs, Samuel, 1771-1815
